\usepackage{xpgfkeys}

\begin{document}
\makeatletter

\defvalues{%
  /fama/width/.new length   =5pt,
  /fama/sep/.new dimen      =\fboxsep + \fboxrule,
  /famb/width/.new length   =[4pt]1pt,
  /widthx/.new length       =2pt,
  /famc/widthc/.new length  =3pt,
  /fam/test/.new value      =fifteen,
  /fama/testa/.new value      =fifteen,
  /fam/.search also={/fama},
}

\pgfkeys{%
  /fama/width=\fboxsep + \fboxrule,
  /handler config=only existing,
  /fam/sep=12pt,
}
\typeout{test: \valueof{/fama/sep/.@dimen}, \valueof{/fama/sep}, \valueof{/fam/sep},\valueof{/fam/sep/.@dimen}}
